sql.sql: SELECT * FROM pz_jc_csh_dr T WHERE T.SWRY_DM = ? AND (1 = '#macroparam#' OR T.YXBZ = ?) ORDER BY T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM
SELECT * FROM pz_pzgly t WHERE t.yxbz = 'Y'
select * from pz_qtdzlfdzb t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.lqf_dm = ?)
select mx.qtdzssbgdmxuuid, mx.qtdzssbgduuid, mx.qtdzjcuuid, mx.ssqtdzzl_dm, mx.qtdzzg_dm, mx.qtdzqshm, mx.qtdzzzhm, mx.sshxsl, mx.kbpbz from pz_qtdzssbgdmx mx where mx.qtdzssbgduuid = ?
select * from PZ_ZH_QTDZSYQK t where t.qtdzjbdbh=?
select mx.qtdzssbgdmxuuid, mx.qtdzssbgduuid, mx.qtdzjcuuid, mx.ssqtdzzl_dm, mx.qtdzzg_dm, mx.qtdzqshm, mx.qtdzzzhm, mx.sshxsl, mx.qtdzxhsquuid from pz_qtdzssbgdmx mx where mx.qtdzssbgdmxuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM PZ_YPRPZHDXXB T WHERE T.YPRUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM pz_zwcs t WHERE t.pzdw_dm = ? AND t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select b.swryxm ||':'|| a.qtdzjbdbh as dwmc, decode(a.sbbz, 'Y', '已上报，未审批！', '未上报！') as yy from pz_qtdzjbdzb a, dm_gy_swry b where a.jbr_dm_1 = b.swry_dm and a.jbdwr_dm = ? and a.jbrq_1 between to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.sfshtgbz = 'N' and a.cxbz = 'N'

select t.qtdzssbgduuid yspzhm, g.gztzsuuid, t.qtdzssbgdbh yspzbh1, g.gztzsbh, t.tbrq rq, t.lrr_dm fqrxm from pz_qtdzssbgdzb t, pz_qtdzgztzs g where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.qtdzssbgduuid = g.yspzhm and g.sc_tzsuuid is null and g.tybz = 'N' and g.yxbz = 'Y' and g.jsr_dm = ? and g.rq between ? and ? and g.pzyspz_dm = ?
select mx.* from pz_qtdzssbgdzb zb, pz_qtdzssbgdmx mx where zb.qtdzssbgduuid = mx.qtdzssbgduuid and zb.qtdzssbgdbh = ?
select a.* from pz_qtdzjbsc a where a.qtdzlyruuid = ? and a.pzzy_dm not in (#macroparam#)

select zb.qtdzjjbuuid, zb.lcslid, zb.qtdzjjbbh, zb.swjg_dm, zb.bzrq, zb.jzpzzbbbjjqk, zb.jjzczljsl, zb.qtxyjjdzljxysmdwt, zb.jsr_dm, zb.yjr_dm, zb.zfbz_1, zb.jjbz, zb.hsyj, zb.jsrq, zb.fhyj, zb.fhr_dm, zb.fhrq from pz_qtdzjjbzb zb where zb.lcslid = ? and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.fhyj = 'N'

select t.qtdzssbgduuid yspzhm, t.qtdzssbgdbh yspzbh1, t.tbrq tfrq from pz_qtdzssbgdzb t where t.lrr_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and t.hxbz='Y' and t.tbrq between ? and ? and not exists(select 1 from pz_qtdzgztzs a where t.qtdzssbgduuid=a.yspzhm and a.tybz = 'N' and a.yxbz='Y') and not exists (select 1 from pz_qtdzflz b where b.yspzhm = t.qtdzssbgduuid and b.xhuuid is null and b.tzlx_dm in ('1','2'))
select * from pz_qtdzjbsc a where a.jzpzbh = ? and a.pzzy_dm = ?
select * from pz_qtdzssbgdzb a where a.qtdzssbgduuid = ?

SELECT T.YZDWXH AS CODE, T.YZDWMC AS CAPTION, T.YZDWLX_DM FROM CS_PZ_YZDWXX T WHERE T.SWJG_DM IN ( select swjg_dm from( select * from qx_swjg_zns where zn_dm = '05' and yxbz = 'Y' and sjswjg_dm is not null ) pzzns start with pzzns.swjg_dm =? connect by prior pzzns.sjswjg_dm = pzzns.swjg_dm) AND trunc(SYSDATE) BETWEEN trunc(T.YXQSRQ) AND trunc(T.YXZZRQ)
SELECT * FROM PZ_JBSC T WHERE T.YPRUUID = ? AND T.PZZY_DM <> '01' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.qtdzlfduuid yspzhm, t.qtdzlfdbh yspzbh1, t.lrrq tfrq, lfdlx_dm pzzyDm from Pz_Qtdzlfdzb t where t.lrr_dm = ? and zfbz_1 != 'Y' and lrrq between ? and ? and lfdlx_dm!='5' and not exists(select 1 from pz_qtdzgztzs a where t.qtdzlfduuid=a.yspzhm and a.tybz = 'N' and a.yxbz='Y') and not exists (select 1 from pz_qtdzflz b where b.yspzhm = t.qtdzlfduuid and b.xhuuid is null and b.tzlx_dm in ('1','2'))

select distinct t.jzxhuuid, t.yspzbh_1, t.tfrq, t.pzzy_dm, t3.pzzwzymc as zy, t2.qtdzzg, t.qtdzqshm pzqshm, t.qtdzzzhm pzzzhm, t.lqs, (nvl(t.kjs,0) + nvl(t.zfs,0)) as hj, t.kjs, t.zfs, t.sshxs, t.jc, t.zl_jc from pz_qtdzjbsc t inner join dm_pz_pzzwzy t3 on t.pzzy_dm = t3.pzzwzy_dm left join cs_pz_qtdzzgb t2 on t.qtdzzg_dm = t2.qtdzzg_dm where t.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and t.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and t.qtdzzl_dm=? and t.qtdzlyruuid =? order by tfrq,t.pzzy_dm,t.jzxhuuid
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPKJBDDRB T WHERE T.SWRY_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.YXBZ = ?) ORDER BY T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM

SELECT JC.PZZG_DM FROM PZ_JC JC WHERE JC.PZZT_DM = ? AND JC.YXBZ = 'Y' AND JC.PZZL_DM = ? AND JC.PZZG_DM IN (#macroparam#) UNION SELECT CSH.PZZG_DM FROM PZ_JC_CSH CSH WHERE CSH.YXBZ = 'Y' AND CSH.PZZL_DM = ? AND CSH.PZZG_DM IN (#macroparam#)
SELECT * FROM PZ_JC T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.PZZT_DM = ?

select /*+use_concat*/ b.ypruuid, b.yprmc, count(1) as sl from v_zs_pz_pzsyqk a, pz_ypr b where decode(b.yprlx_dm, 12, swry_dm, b.djxh) = some(a.sddwdjxh, a.kpr_dm) and b.yxbz = 'Y' and a.PZZT_DM in ('02', '03') and b.pzhsjg_dm = ? and a.SJXHRQ between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') group by b.ypruuid, b.yprmc

select distinct t.jzxhuuid, t.tfrq, t.qtdzzl_dm, decode(t.pz_yspz_dm,'06','02',t.pz_yspz_dm) as pz_yspz_dm, t1.pzyspzmc as mc, t.yspzbh_1 as yspzhm, t.pzzy_dm, t3.pzzwzymc as zy, t.qtdzzg_dm, t2.qtdzzg, t.qsh pzqshm, t.zzh pzzzhm, t.rks, t.fcs, t.kjs, t.zfs, t.sshxs, nvl(t.bj_jc,0) + nvl(t.ss_jc,0) as hj, t.bj_jc, t.zl_bj_jc, t.ss_jc, t.zl_ss_jc from pz_qtdzflz t left join dm_pz_pzyspz t1 on t.pz_yspz_dm = t1.pzyspz_dm inner join dm_pz_pzzwzy t3 on t.pzzy_dm = t3.pzzwzy_dm left join cs_pz_qtdzzgb t2 on t.qtdzzg_dm = t2.qtdzzg_dm where t.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and t.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and t.qtdzzl_dm =? and t.pzdw_dm=? order by tfrq,t.pzzy_dm,t.jzxhuuid
select * from cs_pz_qtdzzgb t where t.swjg_dm = ? and t.qtdzzl_dm = ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq

SELECT * FROM PZ_QTDZHZJHZB A WHERE A.TBSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND A.PZJHZL_DM = ? AND A.JHNYQ = ? AND A.JHNYZ = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR SBBZ = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR HZBZ_1 = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JHLX_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR SJHZJHUUID = ?)
SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(T.JBRQ_1 + NUMTODSINTERVAL(1, 'SECOND')), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') FROM PZ_QTDZJBDZB T WHERE T.SFSHTGBZ = 'Y' AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and t.cxbz= 'N' AND T.Jbr_Dm_1= ?
select distinct t.pzzl_dm from pz_jbsc t where t.ypruuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 ='N'
SELECT * FROM PZ_QTDZHZJHZB T WHERE T.QTDZHZJHUUID = ?
SELECT * FROM PZ_PZGLY T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM FROM V_ZS_PZ_PZSYQK T WHERE T.SJXHRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND T.SDDWDJXH = ? AND T.PZZT_DM IN ('02', '03') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DM_PZ_PZZL T2 WHERE T2.SJPZZL_DM = '000001010' AND T2.PZZL_DM = T.PZZL_DM) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPZJBWXZQD T1 WHERE T1.PZSYQKUUID = T.PZSYQKUUID AND T1.YPRUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZQSHM) >= TO_NUMBER(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZZZHM) <= TO_NUMBER(?)) ORDER BY T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM

select jc.qtdzjcuuid, jc.qtdzhsjg_dm, jc.czyuuid, jc.yprlx_dm, jc.qtdzzl_dm, jc.qtdzzg_dm, jc.qtdzqshm, jc.qtdzzzhm, jc.jcsl, jc.rkrq, jc.ffyxj, jc.qtdzdjbz, jc.pzzt_dm from pz_qtdzjc jc where jc.qtdzdjbz = 'N' #macroparam# order by jc.qtdzzl_dm, jc.qtdzzg_dm, jc.ffyxj desc, jc.rkrq asc, jc.qtdzqshm asc

SELECT T.PZSYQKUUID, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM, T.PZZT_DM, T.PZSL, T.KJZFSL, T.SKJE, T.TFRQ, T.SJXHRQ FROM V_ZS_PZ_PZSYQK T WHERE (T.SDDWDJXH = ? OR T.KPR_DM = ?) AND (T.PZZT_DM IS NULL OR T.PZZT_DM NOT IN ('02', '03')) AND #macroparam# AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZQSHM) >= TO_NUMBER(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZZZHM) <= TO_NUMBER(?)) ORDER BY T.SJXHRQ ASC, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, PZQSHM, PZZZHM

WITH ssJC AS ( SELECT '' AS kid,t.pzzl_dm, t.bj_jc + t.ss_jc as ss_jc FROM pz_flz t WHERE t.pzzy_dm = ? AND t.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND t.pzdw_dm IN (#macroparam#) UNION ALL SELECT m.ypruuid AS kid,m.pzzl_dm, m.jc AS ss_jc FROM pz_jbsc m WHERE m.pzzy_dm = ? AND m.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND m.ypruuid IN (#macroparam#) ) SELECT pzzl_dm, SUM(ss_jc) AS ss_jc FROM ssjc GROUP BY (pzzl_dm)
SELECT * FROM PZ_PZGLY T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM PZ_ZWCS T WHERE T.PZDW_DM = ? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select t.jzrq from pz_zwcs t where t.pzdw_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT * FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.DJXH = ?
SELECT t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm, t.jcsl FROM pz_jc_csh t WHERE t.czyuuid = ? ORDER BY lrrq ASC
select * from pz_qtdzflz a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.jzpzbh = ? and a.pzzy_dm in (#macroparam#)
SELECT A.* FROM PZ_PZGLY A, DM_QX_SWRYSF B WHERE A.PZHSJG_DM = B.SFSWJG_DM AND A.PZGLY_DM = ? AND B.SWRYSF_DM = ? AND A.YXBZ = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM CS_PZ_SSPZSPTJWH T WHERE T.SWJG_DM = ? AND (1 = ? OR T.PZZL_DM = ?)
select mx.* from pz_qtdzjbdzb zb, pz_qtdzjbdmx mx where zb.qtdzjbduuid = mx.qtdzjbduuid and zb.qtdzjbdbh = ?
select * from pz_qtdzjbdmx t where t.qtdzjbduuid = ?
select * from pz_qtdzjc_csh t where t.czyuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT T.GZTZSUUID as pzgdmxuuid, T.GZTZSBH AS pzhmq, T.GZTZSBH AS pzhmz FROM pz_qtdzgztzs T WHERE T.Yxbz = 'Y' AND T.TYBZ = 'Y' AND t.FQPZDW_DM = ? #macroparam# ORDER BY T.GZTZSBH

select zb.qtdzxhsquuid, zb.qtdzxhqcbbh, zb.tbdw_dm, zb.tbr_dm, zb.tbrq, zb.xhjgyj, zb.xhsr, zb.xhzr, zb.spyjsm, zb.pzxhyy_dm, zb.xhswjg_dm, zb.dwfzr_dm, zb.xhqk, zb.xhr_dm_1, zb.jhr, zb.zstybz, zb.zsrq_3, zb.zsr_dm, zb.xhsm, zb.lcslid from pz_qtdzxhsqzb zb where zb.lcslid = ? and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.zstybz = 'N'
SELECT T.PZZG_DM FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB T WHERE T.SWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ
select * from pz_qtdzjbdzb a where a.qtdzjbduuid =?
select a.* from pz_qtdzjbsc a, pz_qtdzjbscjzxx b where b.pzdw_dm = ? and b.nd = ? and b.yf is null and b.jzpzbh = a.jzpzbh and a.pzzy_dm = ?
select * from Pz_Qtdzyjrqszb where qtdzhsjg_dm = ? and yjrqnd=?
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPZPDBGMXB T WHERE T.PZPDBGUUID = ?
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.SWRY_DM = ? AND T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
select zg.qtdzzl_dm, zg.qtdzzg_dm, zg.qtdzzg, zg.qtdzzg_dm as code, zg.qtdzzg as caption from CS_PZ_QTDZZGB zg where zg.qtdzzl_dm = ? and zg.swjg_dm like ?
select * from pz_qtdzjbsc a where a.qtdzlyruuid = ? and a.jzpzbh = ? and a.pzzy_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT DISTINCT T.PZDW_DM AS YPRUUID, T1.YPRLX_DM, T1.YPRMC, T1.DJXH, T1.SWRY_DM FROM PZ_JBSCJZXX T, PZ_YPR T1 WHERE T1.YPRUUID = T.PZDW_DM AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.ND = ? AND T.YF = ? AND T1.YXBZ != 'Y' AND T1.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PZ_ZWCS A WHERE A.PZDW_DM = T.PZDW_DM AND A.CSHRQ IS NOT NULL AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N')
select max(yf) yf from pz_qtdzzwcs where nd = ? and sjgsdq like ?
SELECT MAX(CSHRQ) FROM PZ_ZWCS A WHERE A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.PZDW_DM IN (#macroparam#)
select mx.qtdzssbgdmxuuid, mx.qtdzssbgduuid, mx.qtdzjcuuid, mx.ssqtdzzl_dm, mx.qtdzzg_dm, mx.qtdzqshm, mx.qtdzzzhm, mx.sshxsl, mx.qtdzxhsquuid from pz_qtdzssbgdmx mx where mx.qtdzxhsquuid = ?
select qtdzzl_dm ,sum(jcsl) as bj_jc,'01' as pzzy_dm,'0' as ss_jc, sum(jcsl) as hj from pz_qtdzjc_csh where czyuuid in (#macroparam#) and yxbz = 'Y' group by qtdzzl_dm

SELECT T.PZZL_DM, T.SSPZJKTJWHSJUUID, T.SWJG_DM, T.XHZSSWJG, T.SSHXZSSWJG, T.PZPLZSSWJG FROM CS_PZ_SSPZSPTJWH T WHERE T.SWJG_DM = ? UNION SELECT DISTINCT JGZL.PZZL_DM, NULL AS SSPZJKTJWHSJUUID, NULL AS SWJG_DM, NULL AS XHZSSWJG, NULL AS SSHXZSSWJG, NULL AS PZPLZSSWJG FROM CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL JGZL WHERE JGZL.PZZL_DM NOT IN (SELECT PZZL_DM FROM CS_PZ_SSPZSPTJWH WHERE SWJG_DM = ?)
select zg.pzzg_dm, zg.pzzg, zg.pzzg_dm code, zg.pzzg caption from cs_pz_pzzgb zg where sysdate between zg.yxqsrq and zg.yxzzrq and zg.swjg_dm = ? #macroparam#
SELECT * FROM pz_jbscjzxx t WHERE t.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND t.pzdw_dm = ? AND t.nd = ? AND t.yf = ?

select a.*, b.* from (select mx.sxlx as yssxlx, mx.qtdzzl_dm, mx.qtdzzg_dm, mx.qtdzqshm, mx.qtdzzzhm, mx.pzsl, mx.pzzt_dm from pz_qtdzgztzs zb, pz_qtdzgztzs_mx mx where zb.gztzsuuid = mx.gztzsuuid and mx.sxlx = '1' and zb.gztzsbh = ?) a, (select mx.sxlx , mx.qtdzzl_dm as ysqtdzzl_dm, mx.qtdzzg_dm as ysqtdzzg_dm, mx.qtdzqshm as ysqtdzqshm, mx.qtdzzzhm as ysqtdzzzhm, mx.pzsl as yspzsl, mx.pzzt_dm as yspzzt_dm from pz_qtdzgztzs zb, pz_qtdzgztzs_mx mx where zb.gztzsuuid = mx.gztzsuuid and mx.sxlx = '2' and zb.gztzsbh = ?) b

SELECT T.Qtdzjbduuid as pzgdmxuuid, T.Qtdzjbdbh AS pzhmq, T.Qtdzjbdbh AS pzhmz FROM pz_qtdzjbdzb T WHERE T.Cxbz = 'N' AND T.Jbdwr_Dm = ? AND T.Sfshtgbz = 'Y' AND T.Sbbz = 'Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' #macroparam# ORDER BY T.Qtdzjbdbh

select min(cshrq) from pz_qtdzzwcs a where a.qtdzjzdw in ( select b.qtdzlyruuid czy from pz_qtdzlyr b where b.qtdzhsjg_dm = ? union select c.swjg_dm czy from qx_swjg_zns c where c.sjswjg_dm = ? and c.zn_dm = ? and exists ( select 1 from pz_qtdzgly t where t.qtdzhsjg_dm=c.swjg_dm) ) and a.zfbz_1='N'

SELECT T.PZSYQKUUID FROM V_ZS_PZ_PZSYQK T WHERE T.SJXHRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND (T.SDDWDJXH = ? OR T.KPR_DM = ?) AND T.PZZT_DM IN ('02', '03') AND #macroparam# AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZQSHM) >= TO_NUMBER(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZZZHM) <= TO_NUMBER(?)) ORDER BY T.SJXHRQ ASC, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, PZQSHM, PZZZHM
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPZPDBGZB T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZPDBGBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.BPDDW_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PDRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PDRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
select * from pz_qtdzjbscjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf is null

SELECT T.QTDZLFDUUID as pzgdmxuuid, T.Qtdzlfdbh AS pzhmq, T.Qtdzlfdbh AS pzhmz FROM pz_qtdzlfdzb T WHERE (T.Lqf_Dm = ? OR T.Lqf_Dm in (SELECT W.QTDZLYRUUID FROM pz_qtdzlyr W WHERE W.Qtdzhsjg_Dm = ?)) AND T.Zfbz_1 = 'N' #macroparam# ORDER BY T.Qtdzlfdbh
SELECT distinct T.SKSSSWJG_DM, T.PZHSJG_DM FROM CS_PZ_DSRWPZB T WHERE T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.DSRWPZ_DM = ?
select * from pz_sspzjjb zb where zb.lcslid = ? and zb.zfbz_1='N' and zb.fhyj is null

SELECT ZL.QTDZZL_DM AS CODE, ZL.QTDZZLMC AS CAPTION, '' AS PCODE, ZL.WHPBZ, ZL.WBPZBZ, ZL.PHCD, ZL.WZGBZ FROM DM_PZ_QTDZZL ZL WHERE ZL.QTDZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) UNION ALL SELECT ZG.QTDZZG_DM AS CODE, ZG.QTDZZG AS CAPTION, ZG.QTDZZL_DM AS PCODE, '' AS WHPBZ, '' AS WBPZBZ, 0 AS PHCD, '' AS WZGBZ FROM CS_PZ_QTDZZGB ZG WHERE ZG.QTDZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) and Sysdate between ZG.Yxqsrq and nvl(ZG.Yxzzrq, to_Date('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and zg.swjg_dm like ?

select distinct a.qtdzzl_dm,c.qtdzzlmc from pz_qtdzjbsc a, pz_qtdzjbscjzxx b,dm_pz_qtdzzl c where a.pzzy_dm = '12' and a.xhuuid = b.xhuuid and b.pzdw_dm = ? and b.nd = ? and b.yf = ? and a.qtdzzl_dm = c.qtdzzl_dm order by a.qtdzzl_dm

SELECT DISTINCT T.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS T WHERE T.ZN_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' START WITH T.SWJG_DM = ? AND T.ZN_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SWJG_DM = T.SJSWJG_DM AND T.ZN_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
select pzzl_dm,pzzlmc from dm_pz_pzzl t where t.sjpzzl_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.pzxlbz = 'Y'

select mx.* from pz_sspzssbgdmxb mx, pz_sspzssbgdzb zb where zb.pzssbgduuid = mx.pzssbgduuid and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and mx.pzzl_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.pzzg_dm = ?) and mx.pzqshm <? and mx.pzzzhm >?
select * from pz_qtdzflz a where a.jzpzbh = ? and a.pzzy_dm = ?

select * from pz_qtdzjbdzb t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and t.cxbz = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jbdwr_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.qtdzjbdbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jbrq_1 >=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jbrq_1 <=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'))
select t.qtdzssbgdmxuuid yspzmxhm, t.ssqtdzzl_dm qtdzzl_dm, t.qtdzzg_dm, t.sshxsl jc, t.qtdzqshm, t.qtdzzzhm from pz_qtdzssbgdmx t where t.qtdzssbgduuid = ?
SELECT * FROM PZ_PZGLY G WHERE G.PZGLYUUID = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN G.PZHSJGYXQSRQ AND G.PZHSJGYXZZRQ
select zb.swjg_dm, zb.jsr_dm, zb.yjr_dm from pz_qtdzjjbzb zb where zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.fhyj = 'N' and zb.swjg_dm = ?
SELECT * FROM CS_PZ_JBJXPZB t

select t.pzjjbuuid pzuuid,t.sspzjjbbh pzbh,t.swjg_dm sqdwmc,t.yjr_dm,t.jgr_dm,t.jjr_dm,t.jjrq rq,t.jzpzzbbbjjqk,t.qtxyjjdzljxysmdwt,t.jjzczljsl from pz_sspzjjb t where (1 = ? or t.sspzjjbbh = ?) and (1 = ? or swjg_dm = ?) and trunc(jjrq) between ? and ? and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.fhyj='Y' order by t.sspzjjbbh Asc
SELECT TO_CHAR(MIN(T.RKRQ + NUMTODSINTERVAL(1, 'SECOND')), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') FROM PZ_QTDZLFDZB T WHERE T.LQF_DM =?
select * from pz_qtdzjbsc a where a.yspzhm = ? and a.yspzmxhm = ? and a.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#)

select distinct swry.swry_dm code,swry.swryxm caption from QX_JGGW_SWRYSF gwsf, qx_swjg_gw swjg, dm_qx_swrysf sf,dm_gy_swry swry left join PZ_QTDZLYR lyr on swry.swry_dm = lyr.qtdzlyr_dm where gwsf.gwxh = swjg.gwxh and sf.swrysf_dm = gwsf.swrysf_dm and sf.swry_dm = swry.swry_dm and (lyr.qtdzlyr_dm is null or not sysdate between lyr.yxqsrq and lyr.yxzzrq) and sf.yxbz = 'Y' and swjg.yxbz = 'Y' and gwsf.yxbz = 'Y' and swry.yxbz = 'Y' and swjg.swjg_dm = ?

select zb.qtdzxhsquuid, zb.qtdzxhqcbbh, zb.tbdw_dm, zb.tbr_dm, zb.tbrq, zb.xhjgyj, zb.xhsr, zb.xhzr, zb.spyjsm, zb.pzxhyy_dm, zb.xhswjg_dm, zb.dwfzr_dm, zb.xhqk, zb.xhr_dm_1, zb.jhr, zb.zstybz, zb.zsrq_3, zb.zsr_dm, zb.xhsm, zb.lcslid from pz_qtdzxhsqzb zb where zb.lcslid = ?
select t.* from pz_qtdzgly t where t.yxbz='Y' and t.qtdzglyuuid=?

select distinct a.pzzg_dm, b.pzzg from pz_flz a, cs_pz_pzzgb b where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.pzzl_dm = ? and a.pzzg_dm = b.pzzg_dm and a.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') union select distinct a.pzzg_dm, b.pzzg from pz_jbsc a, cs_pz_pzzgb b where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.pzzl_dm = ? and a.pzzg_dm = b.pzzg_dm and a.tfrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
select a.qtdzyjrq from pz_qtdzyjrqszb a where a.qtdzhsjg_dm like ? and yjrqnd = ? and yjrqyf = ?
select jc.* from pz_jc jc where jc.czyuuid = ? and jc.pzzt_dm = '01' and jc.yxbz = 'Y' and jc.pzzl_dm like '00000401%'

select mx.qtdzssbgdmxuuid, mx.qtdzssbgduuid, mx.qtdzjcuuid, mx.ssqtdzzl_dm, mx.qtdzzg_dm, mx.qtdzqshm, mx.qtdzzzhm, mx.sshxsl, mx.qtdzxhsquuid from pz_qtdzssbgdmx mx, pz_qtdzssbgdzb zb where mx.qtdzssbgduuid = zb.qtdzssbgduuid and zb.hxbz = 'Y' and mx.qtdzxhsquuid is null and zb.tbrq >= to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and zb.tbrq <= to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and zb.sqdw_dm in (SELECT SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG START WITH SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR SJSWJG_DM = SWJG_DM)
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = ?

select * from PZ_ZH_QTDZSYQK t where (t.sshxzt != 'Y' or t.sshxzt is null) and t.qtdzjbdbh is null and kpr_dm = ? and t.TFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss')
select t.* from pz_qtdzgly t where t.yxbz='Y' and t.qtdzhsjg_dm=?
select * from pz_jbscdy a where a.ypruuid = ? and #macroparam# and a.zfbz_1 ='N'
select mx.qtdzjjbmxuuid, mx.qtdzjjbuuid, mx.qtdzzl_dm, mx.qtdzzg, mx.qtdzqshm, mx.qtdzzzhm, mx.jjdqtdzsl, mx.pzzt_dm from pz_qtdzjjbmx mx where mx.qtdzjjbuuid = ?

SELECT T.PZSYQKUUID, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, T.PZQSHM, T.PZZZHM, T.PZZT_DM, T.PZSL, T.KJZFSL, T.SKJE, T.TFRQ, T.SJXHRQ, 1 AS XZ FROM V_ZS_PZ_PZSYQK T WHERE T.SJXHRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND (T.SDDWDJXH = ? OR T.KPR_DM = ?) AND T.PZZT_DM IN ('02', '03') AND #macroparam# AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPZJBWXZQD T1 WHERE T1.PZSYQKUUID = T.PZSYQKUUID AND T1.YPRUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZQSHM) >= TO_NUMBER(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZZZHM) <= TO_NUMBER(?)) ORDER BY T.SJXHRQ ASC, T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, PZQSHM, PZZZHM

select zb.qtdzssbgduuid, zb.qtdzssbgdbh, zb.lcslid, zb.sqdw_dm, zb.sqr_dm, zb.tbrq, zb.ssdwr_dm, zb.ssflxbz, zb.zrrxm, zb.ssrq, zb.ssdd, zb.ssyyjjg, zb.brqksm, zb.pzdc, zb.bz, zb.xhqk, zb.hxrxm, zb.hxrq from pz_qtdzssbgdzb zb where zb.lcslid = ? and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.hxbz = 'N'
SELECT SUBSTR(T.SWJG_DM, 0, 5) AS JHDLS_DM FROM CS_GY_JHDLSYSWJGDZB T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y'

select zg.pzzl_dm,zg.pzzg,zg.pzzg_dm,zg.pzzg_dm as code ,zg.pzzg as caption from cs_pz_pzzgb zg where zg.pzzl_dm = ? and zg.swjg_dm in (SELECT SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG START WITH SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR SJSWJG_DM = SWJG_DM)

SELECT DISTINCT T.YPRUUID, T1.YPRLX_DM, T1.YPRMC, T1.DJXH, T1.SWRY_DM FROM PZ_JBSC T, PZ_YPR T1 WHERE T1.YPRUUID = T.YPRUUID AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.XHUUID IS NULL AND T.JZPZBH IS NULL AND (T.TFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) AND T1.YXBZ != 'Y' AND T1.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PZ_ZWCS A WHERE A.PZDW_DM = T.YPRUUID AND A.CSHRQ IS NOT NULL AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N')
select * from pz_qtdzflzjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf = ?
SELECT T.WGKJSCSQXJSKJBTS AS JBTS, T.SKJBED AS SKED FROM CS_PZ_JBJXPZB T
select * from pz_qtdzlfdmx mx where mx.lrr_dm like ? and exists (select 1 from pz_qtdzlfdzb zb where zb.qtdzlfduuid = mx.qtdzlfduuid and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N') #macroparam#
select * from pz_zwcs where pzdw_dm = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N' for update nowait
select * from pz_qtdzzwcs t where t.qtdzjzdw = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_YPR T, DM_QX_SWRYSF A WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM = A.SFSWJG_DM AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND A.SWRYSF_DM = ? AND T.YPRLX_DM = ?

select t.* from pz_qtdzjbdzb t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.qtdzjbduuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.qtdzjbdbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.sfshtgbz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.pzjblx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jbr_dm_1 = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.sbbz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.cxbz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jbdwr_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.shrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.shrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
select * from pz_qtdzjc_csh mx where mx.lrr_dm like ? #macroparam#
SELECT T.PZZL_DM AS PCODE, T.PZZG AS CAPTION, T.PZZG_DM AS CODE FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB T WHERE T.PZZL_DM = ? AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ

select t.gztzsbh, t.fqpzdw_dm, t.jspzdw_dm from pz_qtdzgztzs t where t.fqpzdw_dm = ? and t.tybz = 'N' and t.yxbz = 'Y' union all select t.gztzsbh, t.fqpzdw_dm, t.jspzdw_dm from pz_qtdzgztzs t where t.jspzdw_dm = ? and t.tybz = 'N' and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.qtdzzg_dm code,t.qtdzzg caption,t.qtdzzl_dm pcode,t.* from cs_pz_qtdzzgb t where sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq and t.gdsbz=?

WITH PZZL AS (SELECT DISTINCT ZL.PZZL_DM CODE, NULL PCODE, ZL.PZZLMC CAPTION, ZL.WHPBZ, ZL.PHCD, ZL.WBPZBZ,cs.swjg_dm FROM CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL CS, DM_PZ_PZZL ZL WHERE CS.PZZL_DM = ZL.PZZL_DM AND ZL.XYBZ = 'Y' AND ZL.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SYSDATE >= NVL(ZL.TYRQ, SYSDATE) AND CS.SWJG_DM like '1%') SELECT CODE, PCODE, CAPTION, WHPBZ, PHCD, WBPZBZ FROM PZZL UNION SELECT PZZG_DM CODE, PZZL_DM PCODE, PZZG CAPTION, NULL WHPBZ, NULL PHCD, NULL WBPZBZ FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB PZZG WHERE PZZG.PZZL_DM IN (SELECT PZZL_DM FROM PZZL) AND PZZG.SWJG_DM like '2%' AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(PZZG.YXQSRQ) AND TRUNC(PZZG.YXZZRQ)
select * from pz_qtdzflzjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.jzpzbh = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf is null
select * from pz_qtdzjbscjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.jzpzbh = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf is null
select a.* from pz_qtdzflz a, pz_qtdzflzjzxx b where b.pzdw_dm = ? and b.nd = ? and b.yf is null and b.jzpzbh = a.jzpzbh and a.pzzy_dm = ?
select * from zs_ls_jmqysdshd_pl
SELECT T.* FROM PZ_JBSC T WHERE T.YSPZBH_1 = ?

select zb.qtdzssbgduuid, zb.qtdzssbgdbh, zb.lcslid, zb.sqdw_dm, zb.sqr_dm, zb.tbrq, zb.ssdwr_dm, zb.ssflxbz, zb.zrrxm, zb.ssrq, zb.ssdd, zb.ssyyjjg, zb.brqksm, zb.pzdc, zb.bz, zb.xhqk, zb.hxrxm, zb.hxrq from pz_qtdzssbgdzb zb where zb.lcslid = ?

SELECT TRUNC(A.TFRQ) TFRQ, A.YSPZBH_1, A.PZZL_DM, A.LQS, A.KJS, A.JC, A.ZL_JC, A.PZZY_DM FROM PZ_JBSC A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DM_PZ_PZZL B WHERE B.SJPZZL_DM = '000004010' AND B.XYBZ = 'Y' AND B.YXBZ = 'Y' AND B.PZXLBZ = 'Y' AND B.PZZL_DM = A.PZZL_DM) AND A.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND A.YPRUUID = ? AND A.TFRQ > = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND A.TFRQ < = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.PZZY_DM IN (#macroparam#))
select a.* from pz_qtdzflz a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.pzzy_dm not in (#macroparam#)
select mx.qtdzxhsqmxuuid, mx.qtdzxhsquuid, mx.qtdzzl_dm, mx.qtdzzg, mx.qtdzqshm, mx.qtdzzzhm, mx.xhsl, mx.gdbgnx, mx.ybgnx, mx.ljhm, mx.qtdzjcuuid from pz_qtdzxhsqmxb mx where mx.qtdzxhsquuid = ?

SELECT MX.PZZL_DM, MX.PZZG_DM, MX.LQSL, MX.PZQSHM, MX.PZZZHM, MX.BZ, ZL.PHCD, ZL.WHPBZ FROM PZ_SSPZLFDZB ZB, PZ_SSPZLFDMXB MX, DM_PZ_PZZL ZL WHERE ZB.PZLFDUUID = MX.PZLFDUUID AND MX.PZZL_DM = ZL.PZZL_DM AND ZB.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ZB.LFDLX_DM = ? AND ZB.FFFLX_DM = ? AND ZB.LQFLX_DM = ? AND ZB.SSPZLFDBH = ? AND ZB.LQDWR = ?
select t.* from pz_zh_qtdzsyqk t where t.qtdzzl_dm = ? and t.qtdzjbdbh is null and t.kpr_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.qtdzzg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.qtdzhm = ?) order by tfrq desc

SELECT DISTINCT T.YPRUUID, T1.YPRLX_DM, T1.YPRMC, T1.DJXH, T1.SWRY_DM FROM PZ_JBSC T, PZ_YPR T1 WHERE T1.YPRUUID = T.YPRUUID AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.XHUUID IS NOT NULL AND T.JZPZBH IS NOT NULL AND (T.TFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) AND T1.YXBZ != 'Y' AND T1.PZHSJG_DM = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PZ_ZWCS A WHERE A.PZDW_DM = T.YPRUUID AND A.CSHRQ IS NOT NULL AND A.ZFBZ_1 = 'N')
SELECT * FROM PZ_YJRQSZB T WHERE T.YJRQND = ? AND T.YJRQYF = ?

select zb.qtdzxhsquuid, zb.qtdzxhqcbbh, zb.tbdw_dm, zb.tbr_dm, zb.tbrq, zb.xhjgyj, zb.xhsr, zb.xhzr, zb.spyjsm, zb.pzxhyy_dm, zb.xhswjg_dm, zb.dwfzr_dm, zb.xhqk, zb.xhr_dm_1, zb.jhr, zb.zstybz, zb.zsrq_3, zb.zsr_dm, zb.xhsm, zb.lcslid from pz_qtdzxhsqzb zb where zb.tbdw_dm = ? and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.zstybz = 'N'
select * from pz_qtdzflz a where a.yspzhm = ? and a.yspzmxhm = ? and a.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG T WHERE T.SWJGBZ = '0' AND YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.JGJC_DM BETWEEN '40' AND '42' START WITH T.SWJG_DM = ? AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SJSWJG_DM = T.SWJG_DM

SELECT G.PZHSJG_DM FROM PZ_PZGLY G, DM_QX_SWRYSF SF WHERE SF.SFSWJG_DM = G.PZHSJG_DM AND SF.SWRYSF_DM = ? AND G.YXBZ = 'Y' UNION SELECT T1.PZHSJG_DM FROM PZ_YPR T1 WHERE T1.SWRY_DM = ? AND T1.YPRLX_DM = ? AND T1.YXBZ = 'Y'
select * from dm_pz_qtdzzl where yxqz is null or yxqz > sysdate order by qtdzzl_dm

select t.ypruuid, nsr.nsrmc as yprmc from pz_ypr t, dj_nsrxx nsr where t.pzhsjg_dm = ? and t.yxbz = ? and (t.yprlx_dm = ? or t.yprlx_dm = ?) and t.djxh = nsr.djxh and t.yprmc != nsr.nsrmc union all select t.ypruuid, dm.swryxm as yprmc from pz_ypr t, dm_gy_swry dm where t.pzhsjg_dm = ? and t.yxbz = ? and t.yprlx_dm = ? and t.swry_dm = dm.swry_dm and t.yprmc != dm.swryxm

select zb.qtdzssbgduuid, zb.qtdzssbgdbh, zb.lcslid, zb.sqdw_dm, zb.sqr_dm, zb.tbrq, zb.ssdwr_dm, zb.ssflxbz, zb.zrrxm, zb.ssrq, zb.ssdd, zb.ssyyjjg, zb.brqksm, zb.pzdc, zb.bz, zb.xhqk, zb.hxrxm, zb.hxrq, zb.hxsl from pz_qtdzssbgdzb zb where zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.hxbz = 'N' and zb.sqdw_dm =?
select 1 from pz_qtdzjc jc where jc.qtdzzg_dm = ? union all select 1 from pz_qtdzlfdmx lf where lf.qtdzzg_dm =? union all select 1 from pz_qtdzjc_csh csh where csh.qtdzzg_dm = ?

select t.yspzmxhm yspzmxhm, t.qtdzzl_dm, t.qtdzzg_dm, t.pzsl jc, t.qtdzqshm, t.qtdzzzhm, t.gztzsuuid, t.gztzsmxuuid from pz_qtdzgztzs_mx t, pz_qtdzgztzs a where t.gztzsuuid = a.gztzsuuid and t.yspzmxhm=? and a.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sxlx='2' and a.tybz = 'Y' and t.lrrq=(select max(lrrq) from pz_qtdzgztzs_mx where yspzmxhm=?)
select t.*,t.xhsl pzsl from pz_sspzxhsqmxb t where t.sspzxhsquuid = ?

select jc.qtdzjcuuid, jc.qtdzhsjg_dm, jc.czyuuid, jc.yprlx_dm, jc.qtdzzl_dm, jc.qtdzzg_dm, jc.qtdzqshm, jc.qtdzzzhm, jc.jcsl, jc.rkrq, jc.ffyxj, jc.qtdzdjbz, jc.pzzt_dm from pz_qtdzjc jc where jc.qtdzhsjg_dm = ?
SELECT T.QTDZZL_DM, SUM(T.PZJHSL) AS HZSL, SUM(T.PZJHSL) AS PZJHSL FROM PZ_QTDZHZJHMXB T WHERE T.QTDZHZJHUUID IN (#macroparam#) GROUP BY T.QTDZZL_DM

select a.* from pz_jc a where a.yxbz='Y' and a.czyuuid = ? and a.pzzl_dm = ? AND (1=? or a.pzzg_dm = ?) and a.pzzt_dm = ? and a.pzqshm <= ? and a.pzzzhm >= ? and a.yprlx_dm = ? and a.jcsl > 0 for update nowait

select t.qtdzlyr_dm as code from pz_qtdzlyr t where t.qtdzhsjg_dm like ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq union all select t1.qtdzgly_dm as code from pz_qtdzgly t1 where t1.qtdzhsjg_dm like ? and yxbz='Y'

SELECT DISTINCT ZL.PZZL_DM CODE, NULL PCODE, ZL.PZZLMC CAPTION, ZL.WHPBZ, ZL.PHCD, ZL.WBPZBZ, ZL.XJPZBZ, ZL.STXJGLBZ, NULL GDSBZ FROM CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL CS, DM_PZ_PZZL ZL WHERE CS.PZZL_DM = ZL.PZZL_DM AND ZL.XYBZ = 'Y' AND ZL.YXBZ = 'Y' UNION SELECT PZZG_DM CODE, PZZL_DM PCODE, PZZG CAPTION, NULL WHPBZ, NULL PHCD, NULL WBPZBZ, NULL XJPZBZ, NULL STXJGLBZ, GDSBZ FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB PZZG WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN PZZG.YXQSRQ AND PZZG.YXZZRQ
SELECT T1.DJXH, SUM(T.JCSL) AS YXBZ FROM PZ_JC T, PZ_YPR T1,PZ_LS_DJXH DJ WHERE T.CZYUUID = T1.YPRUUID AND t1.yxbz='Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.PZZT_DM = '01' AND DJ.DJXH = T1.DJXH GROUP BY T1.DJXH
SELECT DISTINCT T.PZZL_DM FROM PZ_JBSC T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.YPRUUID = ? AND (T.TFRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'))

select t.* from pz_qtdzlyr t where sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq and (1 = #macroparam# or t.qtdzhsjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.qtdzlyr_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.qtdzlyruuid = ?)
select y.pzxhyy_dm, y.pzxhyymc, y.pzxhyy_dm as code, y.pzxhyymc as caption from dm_pz_pzxhyy y where y.xybz = 'Y' and y.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.gzq, a.ysqtdzzl_dm, a.ysqtdzzg_dm, a.ysqshm, a.yszzhm, a.yspzsl, '更正后' gzh, b.qtdzzl_dm, b.qtdzzg_dm, b.qtdzqshm, b.qtdzzzhm, b.pzsl, a.yspzmxhm from (select '更正前' gzq, t1.gztzsuuid, t1.yspzmxhm, t1.qtdzzl_dm ysqtdzzl_dm, t1.qtdzzg_dm ysqtdzzg_dm, t1.qtdzqshm ysqshm, t1.qtdzzzhm yszzhm, t1.pzsl yspzsl, t1.sxlx from pz_qtdzgztzs_mx t1 where t1.gztzsuuid = ? and t1.sxlx = '1') a left join pz_qtdzgztzs_mx b on a.yspzmxhm = b.yspzmxhm where b.gztzsuuid = a.gztzsuuid and b.sxlx = '2'
SELECT * FROM PZ_PZGLY T WHERE T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND T.PZHSJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)
SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPZJBWXZQD T WHERE T.YPRUUID = ?
select pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, t.jjpzsl pzsl, pzqshm, pzzzhm, a.pzztmc pzzt_dm from pz_sspzjjqkmx t,dm_pz_pzzt a where pzjjbuuid= ? and t.pzzt_dm = a.pzzt_dm
SELECT * FROM PZ_YPR T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
select * from pz_qtdzlfdzb where qtdzlfduuid = ?

select * from pz_qtdzgdzb t where t.bbdw_dm = ? and t.zfr_dm is null and t.zfrq_1 is null and t.bbrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') order by t.bbrq desc
SELECT SWJG_DM FROM CS_PZ_PZSPJG

WITH T1 AS (SELECT '000006010' AS PZZL_DM, A.KKZT_DM, A.DZSPHM, A.SJJE AS JE FROM ZS_SKY_KKXX A WHERE A.KKZT_DM IN ('01', '02') AND A.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND ((A.LRRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) OR (A.XGRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))) UNION ALL SELECT '000007010' AS PZZL_DM, B.KKZT_DM, B.DZSPHM, B.HJJE AS JE FROM ZS_SKY_PLTKZB B WHERE B.SKYJYLX_DM = 'SKTKA1' AND B.KKZT_DM IN ('01', '02') AND B.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND ((B.LRRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) OR (B.XGRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))), T2 AS (SELECT T1.*, CASE WHEN T1.DZSPHM - 1 = LAG(T1.DZSPHM) OVER(PARTITION BY T1.PZZL_DM, T1.KKZT_DM ORDER BY T1.PZZL_DM, T1.KKZT_DM, T1.DZSPHM) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS LXBZ FROM T1), T3 AS (SELECT T2.*, SUM(LXBZ) OVER(PARTITION BY T2.PZZL_DM, T2.KKZT_DM ORDER BY T2.PZZL_DM, T2.KKZT_DM, T2.DZSPHM) AS FZBZ FROM T2) SELECT T3.PZZL_DM, T3.KKZT_DM, MIN(T3.DZSPHM) AS PZQSHM, MAX(T3.DZSPHM) AS PZZZHM, CASE WHEN T3.KKZT_DM = '01' THEN COUNT(1) ELSE 0 END AS PZSL, CASE WHEN T3.KKZT_DM = '01' THEN SUM(T3.JE) ELSE 0 END AS SKJE, CASE WHEN T3.KKZT_DM = '02' THEN COUNT(1) ELSE 0 END AS KJZFSL FROM T3 GROUP BY T3.PZZL_DM, T3.KKZT_DM, T3.FZBZ ORDER BY T3.PZZL_DM, T3.KKZT_DM, T3.FZBZ

SELECT CASE WHEN JG.JGJC_DM = '00' THEN '01' WHEN JG.JGJC_DM BETWEEN '10' AND '24' THEN '02' WHEN JG.JGJC_DM BETWEEN '30' AND '32' THEN '03' WHEN JG.JGJC_DM BETWEEN '40' AND '42' THEN '04' WHEN JG.JGJC_DM BETWEEN '50' AND '52' THEN '05' WHEN JG.JGJC_DM BETWEEN '60' AND '62' THEN '06' END FROM DM_GY_SWJG JG WHERE JG.SWJG_DM = ?

select t.qtdzlfduuid yspzhm, g.gztzsuuid , t.qtdzlfdbh yspzbh1, g.gztzsbh, t.lrrq rq, t.lrr_dm fqrxm from pz_qtdzlfdzb t, pz_qtdzgztzs g where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.qtdzlfduuid = g.yspzhm and t.qtdzlfdbh = g.yspzbh_1 and g.sc_tzsuuid is null and g.tybz = 'N' and g.yxbz = 'Y' and g.jsr_dm = ? and g.rq between ? and ? and g.pzyspz_dm = ?
select * from pz_qtdzflzjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf is null
select t.qtdzjbdmxuuid yspzmxhm, t.qtdzzl_dm, t.qtdzzg_dm, t.pzsl jc, t.qtdzqshm, t.qtdzzzhm from pz_qtdzjbdmx t where t.qtdzjbduuid= ?
SELECT * FROM CS_PZ_SSPZSPTJWH T WHERE T.SWJG_DM = ?
select * from pz_qtdzjbscjzxx a where a.pzdw_dm = ? and a.nd = ? and a.yf = ?

select 1 from dual where exists (select /*+use_concat*/ 1 from v_zs_pz_pzsyqk a, pz_ypr b where decode(b.yprlx_dm, 12, swry_dm, b.djxh) = some(a.sddwdjxh, a.kpr_dm) and b.yxbz = 'Y' and a.PZZT_DM in ('02', '03') and b.pzhsjg_dm = ? and a.SJXHRQ between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))

select zb.qtdzjjbuuid, zb.lcslid, zb.qtdzjjbbh, zb.swjg_dm, zb.bzrq, zb.jzpzzbbbjjqk, zb.jjzczljsl, zb.qtxyjjdzljxysmdwt, zb.jsr_dm, zb.yjr_dm, zb.zfbz_1, zb.jjbz, zb.hsyj, zb.jsrq, zb.fhyj, zb.fhr_dm, zb.fhrq from pz_qtdzjjbzb zb where zb.lcslid = ?

select t.sspzxhsquuid pzuuid,t.sspzxhsqbh pzbh,t.bbdw_dm sqdwmc,t.bbrq rq,t.xhswjg_dm,t.xhrq,t.dwfzr_dm,t.xhr_dm_1 xhr_dm,t.jhr,t.xhrq,t.pzxhyy_dm from pz_sspzxhsqzb t where (1 = ? or t.sspzxhsqbh = ?) and (1 = ? or bbdw_dm = ?) and trunc(bbrq) between ? and ? and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.zstybz = 'Y' order by t.sspzxhsqbh Asc

select t.qtdzjbduuid yspzhm, g.gztzsuuid, t.qtdzjbdbh yspzbh1, g.gztzsbh, t.jbrq_1 rq, t.lrr_dm fqrxm from pz_qtdzjbdzb t, pz_qtdzgztzs g where t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and t.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and t.qtdzjbduuid = g.yspzhm and g.sc_tzsuuid is null and g.tybz = 'N' and g.yxbz = 'Y' and g.jsr_dm = ? and g.rq between ? and ? and g.pzyspz_dm = ?
SELECT T.PZZL_DM AS PCODE, T.PZZG AS CAPTION, T.PZZG_DM AS CODE FROM CS_PZ_PZZGB T WHERE T.PZZL_DM = ? AND t.swjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ
SELECT * FROM CS_GY_JJR T WHERE T.JJRQSRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND T.JJRZZRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND T.SWJG_DM = ? AND T.XYBZ = 'Y'

select t.qtdzssbgduuid, t.qtdzssbgdbh, t.sqdw_dm, t.sqr_dm, t.tbrq, t.ssdwr_dm, t.zrrxm, t.ssrq, t.ssdd, t.ssyyjjg, t.ssflxbz from pz_qtdzssbgdzb t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.hxbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.qtdzssbgdbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.sqdw_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.hxrq >=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.hxrq <=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'))
select sxgn.skssswjg_dm from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz sxgn where sxgn.skyjylx_dm = 'SKKKA1' and sxgn.yxbz = 'Y' and sxgn.xybz = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM PZ_QTDZHZJHMXB T WHERE T.QTDZHZJHUUID = ?
select * from pz_lyrqtdzzlhdxxb t where t.qtdzlyruuid = ? and sysdate between t.yxqsrq and t.yxzzrq
SELECT * FROM cs_pz_jbjxpzb
SELECT DISTINCT T.PZZL_DM FROM PZ_JC_CSH T WHERE T.PZHSJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'

select zb.qtdzjjbuuid, zb.lcslid, zb.qtdzjjbbh, zb.swjg_dm, zb.bzrq, zb.jzpzzbbbjjqk, zb.jjzczljsl, zb.qtxyjjdzljxysmdwt, zb.jsr_dm, zb.yjr_dm, zb.zfbz_1, zb.jjbz, zb.hsyj, zb.jsrq, zb.fhyj, zb.fhr_dm, zb.fhrq from pz_qtdzjjbzb zb where zb.yjr_dm = ? and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.fhyj = 'N'
select * from pz_qtdzlfdzb a where a.lfdlx_dm = ? and a.lqf_dm = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT T.QTDZSSBGDUUID as pzgdmxuuid, T.QTDZSSBGDBH AS pzhmq, T.QTDZSSBGDBH AS pzhmz FROM pz_qtdzssbgdzb T WHERE T.Sqdw_Dm = ? AND T.Zfbz_1 = 'N' AND T.Hxbz = 'Y' #macroparam# ORDER BY T.QTDZSSBGDBH

select t.qtdzlyruuid, ry.swryxm, ry.swry_dm from pz_qtdzlyr t, dm_gy_swry ry where t.qtdzlyr_dm = ry.swry_dm and t.qtdzhsjg_dm = ? and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxzzrq and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= t.yxqsrq and exists( select 1 from pz_qtdzzwcs a where a.qtdzjzdw = t.qtdzlyruuid and a.cshrq is not null and a.zfbz_1 = 'N')
SELECT t.pzhsjg_dm FROM pz_pzgly t WHERE t.yxbz ='Y'
select t.qtdzlfdmxuuid yspzmxhm, t.qtdzzl_dm, t.qtdzzg_dm, t.lqsl jc, t.qtdzqshm, t.qtdzzzhm from pz_qtdzlfdmx t where t.qtdzlfduuid = ?

SELECT T.SWJG_DM AS CODE, T.SJSWJG_DM AS PCODE, T.SWJGMC AS CAPTION FROM DM_GY_SWJG T WHERE T.SWJGBZ = '0' AND SUBSTR(JGJC_DM, 0, 1) <= 4 START WITH T.SWJG_DM = ? AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQSRQ AND T.YXZZRQ CONNECT BY PRIOR T.SWJG_DM = T.SJSWJG_DM

select distinct a.qtdzzl_dm,c.qtdzzlmc from pz_qtdzflz a, pz_qtdzflzjzxx b,dm_pz_qtdzzl c where a.pzzy_dm = '12' and a.xhuuid = b.xhuuid and b.pzdw_dm = ? and b.nd = ? and b.yf = ? and a.qtdzzl_dm = c.qtdzzl_dm order by a.qtdzzl_dm
select t.* from pz_qtdzgly t where t.yxbz='Y' and t.qtdzgly_dm=?

SELECT DISTINCT T.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS T WHERE T.ZN_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' START WITH T.SWJG_DM = ? AND T.ZN_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' CONNECT BY T.SWJG_DM = PRIOR T.SJSWJG_DM AND T.ZN_DM = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT T.QTDZXHSQUUID as pzgdmxuuid, T.QTDZXHQCBBH AS pzhmq, T.QTDZXHQCBBH AS pzhmz FROM pz_qtdzxhsqzb T WHERE T.Xhswjg_Dm = ? AND T.Zfbz_1 = 'N' AND T.Zstybz = 'Y' #macroparam# ORDER BY T.QTDZXHQCBBH

WITH TB1 AS (SELECT '票证月结' AS YWLB, PZDW_DM AS JG_DM, YSPZBH_1 AS BH FROM PZ_FLZ WHERE XHUUID IS NULL AND JZPZBH IS NULL AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND PZZY_DM IN ('01', '02', '03', '04', '05', '06', '07', '08', '09', '10') UNION ALL SELECT '票证结报' AS YWLB, PZHSJG_DM AS JG_DM, SSPKJBDBH AS BH FROM PZ_SSPKJBDZB WHERE SHBZ = 'N' AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND CXBZ = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '票证缴销' AS YWLB, JBJXDWR AS JG_DM, SSPZJXBBH AS BH FROM PZ_SSPZJXB WHERE SFSHTGBZ = 'N' AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND CXBZ = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '票证检查' AS YWLB, BSDWR_DM AS JG_DM, CCQDBH AS BH FROM PZ_SSPZJCQDZB WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ZSBZ = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT '票证停用' AS YWLB, BBDW_DM AS JG_DM, SSPZTYZFBH AS BH FROM PZ_SSPZTYZFZB WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ZSRQ_3 IS NULL AND ZSR_DM IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT '票证损失' AS YWLB, SQDW_DM AS JG_DM, PZSSBGDBH AS BH FROM PZ_SSPZSSBGDZB WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ZSRQ_3 IS NULL AND ZSR_DM IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT '票证销毁' AS YWLB, BBDW_DM AS JG_DM, SSPZXHSQBH AS BH FROM PZ_SSPZXHSQZB WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ZSRQ IS NULL AND ZSR_DM IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT '票证交接' AS YWLB, SWJG_DM AS JG_DM, SSPZJJBBH AS BH FROM PZ_SSPZJJB WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND FHR_DM IS NULL AND FHRQ IS NULL) SELECT * FROM TB1 WHERE JG_DM = ?

SELECT T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM, SUM(T.PZSL) AS PZSL, SUM(T.PZSL) AS BQTYS, SUM(T.SKJE) AS SKJE, SUM(T.KJZFSL) AS KJZFSL, SUM(T.KJZFSL) AS BQZFS FROM V_ZS_PZ_PZSYQK T WHERE T.SJXHRQ BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND (T.SDDWDJXH = ? OR T.KPR_DM = ?) AND T.PZZT_DM IN ('02', '03') AND #macroparam# AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PZ_SSPZJBWXZQD T1 WHERE T1.PZSYQKUUID = T.PZSYQKUUID AND T1.YPRUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZQSHM) >= TO_NUMBER(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_NUMBER(T.PZZZHM) <= TO_NUMBER(?)) GROUP BY T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM ORDER BY T.PZZL_DM, T.PZZG_DM
select * from pz_qtdzgdmxb t where t.pzgduuid=?

select zb.qtdzlfduuid, zb.qtdzlfdbh, zb.lfdlx_dm, zb.ffflx_dm, zb.fff_dm, zb.lqflx_dm, zb.lqf_dm, zb.rkrq, zb.lqrxm, zb.ffrxm from pz_qtdzlfdzb zb where zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.lfdlx_dm != '5' and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.qtdzlfdbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.fff_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.lqf_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.rkrq >=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.rkrq <=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'))

SELECT ZL.QTDZZL_DM AS CODE, ZL.QTDZZLMC AS CAPTION, '' AS PCODE, ZL.WHPBZ, ZL.WBPZBZ, ZL.PHCD, ZL.WZGBZ FROM DM_PZ_QTDZZL ZL UNION ALL SELECT ZG.QTDZZG_DM AS CODE, ZG.QTDZZG AS CAPTION, ZG.QTDZZL_DM AS PCODE, '' AS WHPBZ, '' AS WBPZBZ, 0 AS PHCD, '' AS WZGBZ FROM CS_PZ_QTDZZGB ZG WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN ZG.YXQSRQ AND NVL(ZG.YXZZRQ, TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

select t.qtdzjbduuid yspzhm, t.qtdzjbdbh yspzbh1, t.jbrq_1 tfrq from pz_qtdzjbdzb t where t.lrr_dm = ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and t.sfshtgbz='Y' and t.cxbz != 'Y' and t.jbrq_1 between ? and ? and not exists(select 1 from pz_qtdzgztzs a where t.qtdzjbduuid=a.yspzhm and a.tybz = 'N' and a.yxbz='Y') and not exists (select 1 from pz_qtdzflz b where b.yspzhm = t.qtdzjbduuid and b.xhuuid is null and b.tzlx_dm in ('1','2'))

select * from pz_qtdzgztzs s where (s.fqpzdw_dm =? or s.jspzdw_dm =? ) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.gztzsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.rq >=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.rq <=to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'))
select mx.* from pz_qtdzlfdzb zb, pz_qtdzlfdmx mx where zb.qtdzlfduuid = mx.qtdzlfduuid and zb.qtdzlfdbh = ?

select t.pzglyuuid as czyuuid, '11' as yprlx_dm, t.pzhsjg_dm, '' as yprmc, null as djxh from pz_pzgly t, dm_qx_swrysf a where t.pzgly_dm = ? and t.pzhsjg_dm = a.sfswjg_dm and a.swrysf_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' union all select t1.ypruuid as czyuuid, t1.yprlx_dm, t1.pzhsjg_dm, t1.yprmc, t1.djxh from pz_ypr t1, dm_qx_swrysf a where t1.swry_dm = ? and t1.pzhsjg_dm = a.sfswjg_dm and t1.yprlx_dm <> '12' and a.swrysf_dm = ? AND t1.yxbz = 'Y' union all select t1.ypruuid as czyuuid, t1.yprlx_dm, t1.pzhsjg_dm, t1.yprmc, t1.djxh from pz_ypr t1 where t1.swry_dm = ? and t1.yprlx_dm = '12' and t1.yxbz = 'Y'
